description:
Tomozaki begins tutoring Izumi in his favorite game, comes clean to Kikuchi, and gets roped into playing against the vengeful Nakamura after school.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Dungeon Kouryaku Nochi ni Mura ni Kaeru to Tsuyoi Boss ga Itari Suru
Sometimes You Conquer a Dungeon Only to Find a Strong Boss Back in Your Village
ダンジョン攻略後に村に帰ると強いボスがいたりする
